verses.verse: Whoso <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But he that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> is <S%H1198>brutish<s%>.
A <S%H2896>good<s%> man shall <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But a <S%H376>man<s%> of wicked <S%H4209>devices<s%> will he <S%H7561>condemn<s%>.
A <S%H120>man<s%> shall not be <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>; But the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
A <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> is the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%>; But she that maketh <S%H954>ashamed<s%> is as <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H4941>just<s%>; But the <S%H8458>counsels<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are of lying in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall deliver <S%H5337>them<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2015>overthrown<s%>, and are <S%H1004>not<s%>; But the house of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%>.
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H1984>commended<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H7922>wisdom<s%>; But he that is of a <S%H5753>perverse<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H937>despised<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is he that is lightly <S%H7034>esteemed<s%>, and hath a <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Than he that <S%H3513>honoreth<s%> <S%H2638>himself<s%>, and lacketh <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H3045>regardeth<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H929>beast<s%>; But the tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H394>cruel<s%>.

He that <S%H5647>tilleth<s%> his <S%H127>land<s%> shall have <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>; But he that <S%H7291>followeth<s%> after <S%H7386>vain<s%> persons is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2530>desireth<s%> the <S%H4685>net<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8328>men<s%>; But the root of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> yieldeth <S%H5414>fruit<s%>.
In the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> is a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to the <S%H6869>evil<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%>; But the righteous shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; And the <S%H1576>doings<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be rendered unto <S%H7725>him<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H191>fool<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; But he that is <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> unto <S%H6098>counsel<s%>.
A <S%H191>fool<s%>'s <S%H3708>vexation<s%> is <S%H3117>presently<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%>; But a <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H3680>concealeth<s%> <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
He that <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H530>truth<s%> showeth <S%H5046>forth<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; But a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%>, <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> that <S%H981>speaketh<s%> rashly like the <S%H4094>piercings<s%> of a <S%H2719>sword<s%>; But the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is <S%H4832>health<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lip<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>; But a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is but for a <S%H7280>moment<s%>.
Deceit <S%H4820><s%> is in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them that <S%H2790>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>; But to the <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> is <S%H8057>joy<s%>.
There shall no <S%H205>mischief<s%> <S%H579>happen<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Lying <S%H8267><s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But they that <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H530>truly<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3680>concealeth<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimeth<s%> <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> shall bear <S%H4910>rule<s%>; But the <S%H7423>slothful<s%> shall be put under <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.
Heaviness <S%H1674><s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> maketh it <S%H7812>stoop<s%>; But a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> maketh it <S%H8055>glad<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H8446>guide<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> causeth them to <S%H8582>err<s%>.

The <S%H7423>slothful<s%> man <S%H2760>roasteth<s%> not that which he took in <S%H6718>hunting<s%>; But the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>substance<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is to the <S%H2742>diligent<s%>.
In the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is <S%H2416>life<s%>; And in the <S%H5410>pathway<s%> thereof there is no <S%H4194>death<s%>.
